column2: Claim Forida
With the recent weakness of the Spanish Empire, we have a great oppurtunity to gain acess to the Gulf of Mexico.
Form Carpathia
With our dominance of the land on both sides of the Carpathian Mountains, we now have an oppurtunity to show the world how great we have become.
Embrace Bulgarian Minority
The Bulgarian people can now be elevated to a status equal to us.
Embrace Serbian Minority
The Serbian people can now be elevated to a status equal to us.
Embrace Albanian Minority
The Albanian people can now be elevated to a status equal to us.
Form Scandanavia
With our dominance over the scandinavian peninsula, we can now form a union including all the Scandinavian peoples.
Integrate The Baltics
With the Baltic States under our control we can now accept the local peoples as equal citizens.
The German Baltics
With the Baltic States under German control again, we can now accept the local peoples as equal citizens.
Baltic Empire
With the whole of the Baltic Sea under our control, we can now show the world our rightfull claims to all adjacent lands.
Reclaim Prussia
With our recent Strength we can now impose ourselves on former German lands in Prussia and reclaim the for the German people.
Philippines is Ours
We can now impose ourselves onto the Philippennes Islands
Korea is Ours
We can now impose ourselves onto the Korean Peninsula.
Manifest Destiny Past the Mississippi
We can now fufill the first step of our Destiny to control from the atlantic to the pacific by taking control of Louisiana
We are Victorious
After Defeating the Americans and defending our homeland, we can now impose a change to our borders and assure this never happens again.
Hungary to the Sea
We can now fufill our destiny to have Adriatic Sea acess
Embrace greece
We can now elevate the Greek people to the same status as Italians, and regain former Roman glory.
Free The Greeks
We are now strong enough to free the greek people from ottoman opression.
We are Victorious
After defeating the Italians and defending our holdings in greece, we can now impose ourselves on the entirety of greece.
Kleve Will Be Ours
We are now powerful enough to impose ourselves on land owned by the dutch on the rhine river
We are Victorious
After defeating the Rhine Germans, and defending our homeland. We can now assure this will never happen again
Form Lotharingia
We can now restore the old Lotharingian Empire and unite the relevant peoples.
